report.markdown:
# Workflow Execution Report

## Workflow Inputs
```galaxy
invocation_inputs()
```

## Workflow Outputs
```galaxy
invocation_outputs()
```

## Workflow
```galaxy
workflow_display()
```

readme:
# Haploid variant calling for whole genome sequencing paired end data

This workflow uses Illumina or Element read data to discover variants (short nucleotide polymorphisms, SNPs, and small indels) in haploid genomes with multiple genomic sequences (contigs, scaffolds, or chromosomes).

## Inputs dataset

- The workflow needs a list of paired end fastq files
- A GTF containtaing the Gene annotation for the selected haploid genome
- A fasta file for the haploid genome to call variants against

## Outputs

- Tab-delimited summary of annotated variants
- Report summarizing the quality of input data and mapping results

## Processing

- The workflow will remove adapters using fastp
- The filtered reads are aligned with bwa-mem.
- Only properly aligned mate pairs are retained, PCR duplicates are removed.
- Alignments are re-aligned using lofreq viterbi and variants are called with lofreq call.
- Variants are annotated with snpeff eff
changelog:
# Changelog


## [0.1] - 2024-10-29

- Initial version of Paired end variant calling in haploid system workflow
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1100 560" role="img" aria-label="WGS PE Variant Calling in Haploid System workflow diagram">
  <title>Paired-End Variant Calling in Haploid System</title>
  <desc>Variant calling pipeline for haploid organisms: fastp quality trimming, BWA-MEM alignment, filtering and deduplication, LoFreq variant calling with haploid-specific filtering, and SnpEff annotation with field extraction.</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="1100" height="560" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1100" height="560" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>

  <!-- Title bar -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1100" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">Paired-End Variant Calling in Haploid System</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->

  <!-- PE Collection -> fastp -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 125 C 225 125, 230 125, 270 125"/>
  <!-- GTF -> SnpEff build -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 255 C 225 255, 230 255, 270 255"/>
  <!-- Genome fasta -> SnpEff build -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 355 C 210 355, 230 275, 270 275"/>
  <!-- Genome fasta -> BWA-MEM -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 355 C 240 355, 470 165, 500 165"/>

  <!-- fastp -> BWA-MEM -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 430 125 C 465 125, 460 145, 500 145"/>
  <!-- BWA-MEM -> Samtools view -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 660 155 C 695 155, 690 155, 720 155"/>
  <!-- Samtools view -> MarkDuplicates -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 860 155 C 895 155, 890 155, 920 155"/>

  <!-- MarkDuplicates -> Realign reads (row 2) -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 1000 190 C 1030 250, 280 360, 310 380"/>
  <!-- Realign -> LoFreq Call -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 470 395 C 510 395, 500 395, 540 395"/>
  <!-- LoFreq Call -> SnpEff annotate -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 700 395 C 740 395, 730 395, 770 395"/>
  <!-- SnpEff build -> SnpEff annotate (database) -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 350 300 C 350 340, 770 340, 770 370"/>
  <!-- SnpEff annotate -> SnpSift Extract -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 930 395 C 960 395, 955 395, 985 395"/>

  <!-- QC connections (dashed) -->
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 350 170 C 350 310, 460 420, 510 440"/>
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 790 200 C 790 320, 580 420, 550 440"/>
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 960 200 C 960 340, 610 420, 580 440"/>

  <!-- Output connections -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 985 370 C 1010 370, 1010 320, 1010 310"/>
  <path class="connection" d="M 930 370 C 950 370, 960 310, 970 310"/>

  <!-- NODES -->

  <!-- INPUT: PE Collection -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(30, 80)">
    <rect width="150" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="150" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="150" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">1:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">PE Collection</text>
    <text x="75" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Paired-end reads</text>
    <text x="75" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">list:paired collection</text>
    <circle cx="150" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- INPUT: Annotation GTF -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(30, 210)">
    <rect width="150" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="150" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="150" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">2:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Annotation GTF</text>
    <text x="75" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Gene annotation</text>
    <text x="75" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">GTF format</text>
    <circle cx="150" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- INPUT: Genome FASTA -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(30, 310)">
    <rect width="150" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="150" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="150" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">3:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Genome FASTA</text>
    <text x="75" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Reference genome</text>
    <text x="75" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">FASTA format</text>
    <circle cx="150" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING: fastp -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(270, 80)">
    <rect width="160" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="160" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">4:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">fastp</text>
    <text x="80" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Quality trimming</text>
    <text x="80" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Adapter removal</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="160" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="80" cy="90" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING: SnpEff build -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(270, 210)">
    <rect width="160" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="160" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">5:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">SnpEff Build</text>
    <text x="80" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Build database</text>
    <text x="80" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">From GTF + FASTA</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="160" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING: BWA-MEM -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(500, 110)">
    <rect width="160" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="160" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">6:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">BWA-MEM</text>
    <text x="80" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Read alignment</text>
    <text x="80" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">To reference</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="35" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="55" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="160" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING: Samtools view -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(720, 110)">
    <rect width="140" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="140" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="140" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">7:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">Filter + Stats</text>
    <text x="70" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Samtools view</text>
    <text x="70" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Proper pairs only</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="140" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="70" cy="90" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING: MarkDuplicates -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(920, 110)">
    <rect width="150" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="150" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="150" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">8:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">MarkDuplicates</text>
    <text x="75" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">PCR deduplication</text>
    <text x="75" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Picard</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="75" cy="90" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- ROW 2: Realign reads -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(310, 350)">
    <rect width="160" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="160" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">9:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">Realign Reads</text>
    <text x="80" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">LoFreq Viterbi</text>
    <text x="80" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Indel realignment</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="160" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- LoFreq Call -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(540, 350)">
    <rect width="160" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="160" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">10:</text>
    <text x="30" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">LoFreq Call</text>
    <text x="80" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Variant calling</text>
    <text x="80" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Haploid mode</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="160" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- SnpEff annotate -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(770, 350)">
    <rect width="160" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="160" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">11:</text>
    <text x="30" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">SnpEff Annotate</text>
    <text x="80" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Functional effects</text>
    <text x="80" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">+ field extraction</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="160" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT: Annotated Variants -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(960, 270)">
    <rect width="120" height="55" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="120" height="22" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="18" width="120" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="60" y="15" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">Variants Table</text>
    <text x="60" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Annotated, extracted</text>
    <text x="60" y="50" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">fields collapsed</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- REPORT: MultiQC -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(480, 435)">
    <rect width="160" height="80" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="160" height="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="80" y="19" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">MultiQC Report</text>
    <text x="80" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Quality metrics</text>
    <text x="80" y="68" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">fastp, mapping, dedup</text>
    <circle cx="30" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <circle cx="70" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <circle cx="100" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <g transform="translate(30, 525)">
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#495057">Legend:</text>
    <rect x="60" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="80" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Input</text>
    <rect x="130" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="150" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Processing</text>
    <line x1="230" y1="-4" x2="270" y2="-4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="278" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="350" y1="-4" x2="390" y2="-4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="398" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">QC metrics</text>
    <rect x="480" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="500" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Output</text>
    <rect x="560" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="580" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Report</text>
  </g>

</svg>
